description: Media watchdog Ofcom interviewed 351 parents and children in Northern Ireland.
title: 'Hateful content' more likely to be seen by Northern Ireland children
title_page: 'Hateful content' more likely to be seen by Northern Ireland children - BBC News
maintext: Their research also suggests that just over half (55%) of parents in Northern Ireland believe that the benefits of their children being online outweigh the risks, but that is significantly less than the proportion of parents in Wales and Scotland.
